scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && go build -o bronze-backend main.go" "cd frontend && bun run build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && ./bronze-backend" "cd frontend && bun run preview"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && go test ./..." "cd frontend && vue-tsc -b"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd backend && go fmt ./... && go vet ./..." "cd frontend && bun run build --dry-run"
